amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Environmental Programs and Management account (ENERGY STAR) by $48,206,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Environmental Programs and Management account by $48,206,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A033) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A033) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Fleming.
